document.heading: Affordable Homeownership Preservation and Equity Accumulation Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-190, the “Affordable Homeownership Preservation and Equity Accumulation Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-604. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014, and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Nov. 19, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-482 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-190 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
